other_title: B-伝説！ バトルビーダマン 炎魂 (Japanese)
B-伝説！ 戰鬥彈珠人 炎魂 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: After the defeat of the Shadow Alliance, Yamato is in search of special B-Da Balls called Strike Shots, which originated from shooting stars. After a fight with the mysterious Haja and he obtained his Strike Shot, the Drive Shot, Yamato then met Gunnos, a rookie B-DaPlayer and got his own Strike Shot to participate in the Winners Tournament along with Yamato's old friends and rivals. But little they know.....a terrible evil is about to put the B-Da World in peril once more.
